app.name: GNUBOY GX
app.long_description:
Emulator updated by megalomaniac.
GnuboyGX is a port for the Nintendo Gamecube and Nintendo Wii of the open-source Gnuboy emulator, originally coded by Laguna and Gilgamesh. Please read gnuboy-gx.txt and history.txt for list of changes. Visit http://www.gc-forever.com for any questions and updates.
